law.catch_line: Except as provided in Commission regulations, a person may not use, handle, tamper with, obstruct, i...
law.text: Except as provided in Commission regulations, a person may not use, handle, tamper with, obstruct, interfere with, deface, or destroy any part of the water system constructed by the Commission under this subtitle, including pipes, fittings, fireplugs, pumps, engines, appliances, wires, or other fixtures or equipment.
